meanings.sent1: The undoubled cake was just the right size for the party.
meanings.sent2: She wore an undoubled scarf to keep warm in the chilly weather.
meanings.sent3: The undoubled amount of candy in the jar surprised the kids.
meanings.sent4: His undoubled effort in the game earned him the trophy.
meanings.sent5: The undoubled rainbow in the sky was a rare sight.

meanings.definition: Not having any doubt or uncertainty.
meanings.sent1: Her undoubled decision to study abroad was exciting.
meanings.sent2: The undoubled answer to the math problem was clear to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The undoubled belief in magic made the story even more enchanting.
meanings.sent4: His undoubled trust in his friend never wavered.
meanings.sent5: The undoubled confidence in her abilities helped her succeed.
